name: Plant Protector (bearhunter)
description:
So you finally got yourself a plant. Shame all the cats in the neighbourhood know. Arm yourself and fend off against the never-ending hordes for as long as you can. 

Mouse1: Fire

R: Refill

--

A one-day gag project that took almost a week to publish (half the time drawing art (I can't draw art)). While it's in stable condition and fully playable (though missing a lot of sound effects and music), I plan some minor tweaks and extra additions down the road to make the gameplay more varied, perhaps even re-draw some of the first-day cats I got in there. I just wanted to finish something, really, and challenge myself to implement fun ideas. I'll return to this project, keep it as a sort of a 'tutorial base' to master new code. Please report any bugs you find! There's one currently involving very small kittens that I'm working on, but the code's being difficult.

For the next release, I want to add a leaderboard saved locally, then figure out how to host an online one.
